column5: The Data Science course develops core skills in data science, covering a mix of practical and theoretical issues integral to careers in many data driven sectors. You will learn how to approach real-world data problems and how to apply your skills in critical thinking, problem solving and analysis.Course detailsThe Data Science course is an online self-paced programme, with options to study for a PGCert, PGDip and an MSc.
column7: MSc (three years) £18,000 (charged £6,000 per year of study) PG Dip (two years) £12,000 (charged £6,000 per year of study) PG Cert (one year) £6,000
